title: New champion : Lance :3  my little idea

the max number of turrets are 5 and they can be destroyed and

the turrets do nothing themselves but they interract with his abilities
q : orb of despair lance shoot an orb that deals damage to the first enemy striked
but wait there more if he hits a turret with orb of despair the turret will shoot instead the orb in a small area pri

if the turrets are near they will connect them with a purple light the max turret connected are 5
if orb of despair hits a connected turret the attack will travel to the bond of li
light and based on how many turrets are connected it will do things
every turrets will shoot a weakened orb of despair except the last turret that will shoot the special orb and if more turrets attac
the same champion they will deal reduced damage
2 turrets traveled : slow 3 : %max health dmg 4 : %missing health damage 5 stun
w: rise lance summons a turret

ultimate: ender rage
lance shoots a orb that deal more damage based on how many towers
